text:
Looking at this historical German letter, I can identify the following information:

The letter is dated "26. Juni 1926" (June 26, 1926) as shown at the top of the first page.

At the bottom of the last page (Blatt IV), there is a signature section that reads:
"BASLER PERSONENSCHIFFAHRTSGESELLSCHAFT BASEL"

Below that, it indicates this is a copy ("Abschrift an") being sent to:
- "Direktion der Basler Rheinschiffahrt Aktiengesellschaft"
- "Herrn O. Ritter, Pr채sident der Basler Rheinschiffahrt Aktiengesellschaft"

The letter appears to be addressed to the "Internationalen Ausstellung f체r Binnenschiffahrt und Wasserkraftnutzung Basel" (International Exhibition for Inland Shipping and Water Power Use Basel).
